full_text: Even if Vladimir Putin were to pull back and pretend that he has won, he would still be dangerous both to the outside world and at home, where he would inflict more deadly repressions https://t.co/Pepa9v7a9b

localize.full_text: ウラジーミル・プーチンが撤退し、勝ったふりをしたとしても、彼は外の世界にとっても国内においても危険であり、より致命的な抑圧を加えるだろう。https://t.co/Pepa9v7a9b。
